brand_voice: Clear, confident, and human. Avoid jargon and keep sentences tight. Speak as a trusted expert who is easy to understand.
tone: Optimistic, helpful, and direct. Skews professional but never stiff.
audience: Digitally savvy professionals and consumers who value practicality and credibility. Assume limited attention spansâ€”front-load value.
value_props: Practical guidance that saves time or reduces risk
Customer-centric framing that respects reader intelligence
must_include: A specific next step or CTA

style_rules.sentence_length: Prefer short to medium sentences; break up long clauses.
style_rules.structure: Lead with the hook/value, support with one to two proof points, close with CTA.
style_rules.jargon_policy: Avoid buzzwords and internal acronyms unless explained.
style_rules.punctuation: Use plain punctuation; avoid excessive exclamation points.

legal_compliance.claims_policy: No unverifiable or absolute claims. Avoid health/financial guarantees.
legal_compliance.privacy_policy: Do not imply misuse of customer data; avoid referencing private customer details.
legal_compliance.disclaimer_hint: If promising results, include a brief qualifier such as 'results may vary'.

links_policy: Use links only when necessary for conversion or proof; avoid multiple links in the same post.
hashtag_policy: Use only relevant tags that aid discovery; avoid clutter.
